description: Checkout & Contact System for SAWEI E-commerce

features.title: Create Cart Context with localStorage
features.description: Implement cart state management using React Context with localStorage persistence. Store cart items with product ID, quantity, and price.

features.title: Add Cart Button to Product Cards
features.description: Add 'Add to Cart' button on ProductCard and product detail page. Show cart item count in header.
acceptanceCriteria: Add to Cart button on ProductCard
Add to Cart button on product detail page

features.title: Create Checkout Page
features.description: Create checkout page showing cart items, totals, and Stripe checkout button. Connect to existing Stripe API route.
acceptanceCriteria: Shows cart items with quantities and prices

features.title: Create Success Page
features.description: Create checkout success page that clears cart and shows confirmation message.

features.title: Create Quote Request Form
features.description: Create quote request form with name, email, phone, message fields. Show confirmation on submit.

features.title: Add WhatsApp Contact Button
features.description: Add WhatsApp floating button and contact links that open WhatsApp with pre-filled message including product info.
acceptanceCriteria: Pre-fills message with product name and URL
